reviewText: A  nice cartoon for kids and fans a like
Wish they came out with more of this series.  Was better than Zexal
got the movie in great condition with no scratches on I and it arrived in great condition and I am enjoying it ever time I watch it
Great service! There is nothing that needs to be improved at all. Will buy from again sometime in the near future.
It is really cool to watch over and over again and then to really get into it and to really to watch it again and again

I love this series! I have Yu-Gi-Oh Gx:Rise of the sacred Beasts Part 1, so I just HAD to get this one! There are twelve episodes on this disc.

Here they are:

1. A reason to win - where Alexis duels Titan, the shadow duelist

2. Duel Monsters spirit day - where the Dark Magician girl dues Jaden in the Spirit Fesival Day

3. Hearts Gone Wild - where Alexis duels a gambler she knew from gradeschool

4. The seventh Shadow Rider - Chazz, Jaden, Chumbly and Cyrus go out to search for Professor Banner

5. Amnael's End Game - The real shadow rider reveals himself (sorry, not spoiling it!)

6. Amnael's End Game part 2 - (Still not telling...)

7. Chazz Anour - Chazz falls in love with Alexis and wants to duel her to date her

8. Rise of the Sacred Beasts Part 1 - Jaden duels the head of the Shadow Riders!

9. Rise of the Sacred Beasts Part 2 - He still dues with him.

10. Magna Chum Laude - where Chumbly faces off against Dr. Crowler!

11. The Graduation Match - Zane faces off against Jaden

12. The Graduation Match part 2 - still dues him.

So, as you can see, there's a pretty sweet deal here your getting! So get your game on!
